nodes.text: The Firefrost Reactor Facility was a cave compound belonging to the White Maw pirate organization that lay beneath the Chilling Death Spire in the Glacial Fissure region on Hoth. The facility was one of two that supplied power to the ray shields that guarded the White Maw's depot in the wrecked Star of Coruscant dreadnought, and the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython raided the compound in order to deactivate the shield around 3642 BBY.
